channel.title: Who else has found this link
channel.description:
Found this link in the bootstrapped FM terms, and thought it was funny.

item.description:

item.description:
I got mine a couple of weeks ago too! It only took a few days to arrive. I’ll post a pic if I can remember.

item.title: Who else has found this link
item.dc:creator: shantnu
item.description:
stevecookhk:

If you click on “T-shirts” theres an invisible link that sends you a free T-shirt

Just got my shirt, in just a weeks, even though Im in the UK.

item.title: Who else has found this link
item.dc:creator: stevecookhk
item.description:
I like this one that I found in the MailChimp T&C

“Sorry, we don’t accept T-shirts or other forms of barter at this time.”

If you click on “T-shirts” theres an invisible link that sends you a free T-shirt (never got mine tho!).

Read full topic
